headline: Construction Partners Builds Momentum With Texas Expansion
summary: ROAD expands in Texas with the acquisition of eight asphalt plants, boosting its Houston footprint and fueling strong growth momentum.

headline: Pervious Concrete and Asphalt Market Report 2025, with Profiles of Cemex, Sika, Vulcan Materials, UltraTech Cement, Martin Marietta Materials, and More
summary: Key market opportunities include increased adoption in smart cities, rising investments in sustainable construction, and growing demand for eco-friendly, low-impact solutions. Technological advancements, climate-resilient materials, and modular approaches amid trade tensions also drive growth. headline: 3 Unpopular Stocks That Fall Short
summary: When Wall Street turns bearish on a stock, it’s worth paying attention. These calls stand out because analysts rarely issue grim ratings on companies for fear their firms will lose out in other business lines such as M&A advisory.
